column1: Sources:  Federal Ministry of Finance & Central Bank of Nigeria
Notes: 1/ Includes interest payments on debt service, other transfers and extra- budgetary items.
2/ Includes capital repayments  on debt service, other transfers and net-lending.
*   Includes financing by banking system(net) and non-bank public only
** Minus (-) denotes increase; Plus (+) denotes decrease
3/ Includes Public, Special and Trust Funds, Treasury Clearance Funds, excess reserves,etc:
